mapper.select: SELECT * FROM motivation order by rate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO motivation (title, user_id, time, rate, memo, create_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{userId}, #{time}, #{rate}, #{memo}, CURRENT_DATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE motivation SET title = #{title}, userId = #{userId}, time = #{time}, rate = #{rate}, memo = #{memo} WHERE id = #{id}
